ARFilterFactory Class Reference

#import <ARFilter.h>

Inheritance diagram for ARFilterFactory:

List of all members.

Public Member Functions

(ARFilter *) - newFilter

Detailed Description

A factory class for filters, which is used to create multiple instances of the filter with equal parameters, which is useful for applying filters to all coordinates of a point or quaternion.

Member Function Documentation

- (ARFilter *) newFilter  

Create an instance of a filter. This method should be overridden by child classes to return a useful filter instance, depending on the filter factory type.

Returns:
the newly constructed filter.
